data.caption: Regulation 32(1) Of The SEBI (LODR) 2015
data.news_body:
The Company hereby declare that the proceeds of the issue of Preferential issue of Equity Shares & share warrants on private placement basis issued by the Company during quarter ended 30.06.2025 were used for the purpose stated in the offer document and further there is no material deviation in use of proceeds of such issue from the objects stated in the offer document of the issue during the quarter ended June 30 2025. 

The aforementioned statement as annexed in "Annexure 1" herewith has been reviewed and noted by the Audit Committee at its Meeting held on 13.08.2025.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing of Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015 this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 20th May, 2023 inter alia, considered and approved:
1. Standalone Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended on 31st March, 2023 along with Cashflow Statements and the Auditor's Report;
2. Appointment of M/s. Mayank Arora & Co. Practicing Company Secretary (COP No. 13609), as Secretarial Auditors of the Company for the Financial Year 2022-2023.

data.caption: Submission Of Revised Financial Statements For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2022 Of Finkurve Financial Services Limited ('The Company')
data.news_body:
With respect to the aforementioned subject and our intimation dated 20th May, 2022 submitted to BSE Limited, we would like to inform your good office that the Company has convened a Board Meeting on 30th May, 2022 for consideration and approval of the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company for the Quarter and Financial Year ended 31st March, 2022 and had uploaded the Financial Results on BSE Listing Centre within the stipulated timeline as stated under SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
However, it was observed that the page containing the Consolidated Cash Flow Statement in Financial Statements of the Company uploaded on the BSE Listing Centre was erroneously missed. Therefore, we are hereby making good the defect by uploading the complete Financial Statements again for Quarter and Financial Year ended 31st March, 2022 with the inclusion of the Consolidated Cash Flow Statements.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Submission Of Revised Financial Statements For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2022 Of Finkurve Financial Services Limited ('The Company')
data.news_body:
With respect to the aforementioned subject and our intimation dated 20th May, 2022 submitted to BSE Limited, we would like to inform your good office that the Company has convened a Board Meeting on 30th May, 2022 for consideration and approval of the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company for the Quarter and Financial Year ended 31st March, 2022 and had uploaded the Financial Results on BSE Listing Centre within the stipulated timeline as stated under SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
However, it was observed that the page containing the Consolidated Cash Flow Statement in Financial Statements of the Company uploaded on the BSE Listing Centre was erroneously missed. Therefore, we are hereby making good the defect by uploading the complete Financial Statements again for Quarter and Financial Year ended 31st March, 2022 with the inclusion of the Consolidated Cash Flow Statements.

data.news_body:

1. Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Statements of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended on 31st March, 2022 along with the Cash Flow Statements and the statement of Assets and Liabilities;

A copy of Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements for the Quarter and Year ended on 31st March, 2022 along with the Cash Flow Statements and the statement of Assets and Liabilities, along with the Audit Report received from the Statutory Auditors of the Company for the said results is enclosed herewith for your records.

data.caption: Revised Audited Consolidated And Standalone Financial Statements Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended On 31St March, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that due to some printing error, an incorrect file of the Financial Statements for the Quarter and Year ended on 31st March, 2021 was printed and submitted to the Stock Exchange by the Company.

In view of the same, we hereby submit the correct Financial Statements for the said period. Further kindly note that this was merely a printing error and there was no intention to submit false information and we regret the inconvenience caused to the Stock Exchange and the stake holders.

data.caption: Revised Audited Consolidated And Standalone Financial Statements Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended On 31St March, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that due to some printing error, an incorrect file of the Financial Statements for the Quarter and Year ended on 31st March, 2021 was printed and submitted to the Stock Exchange by the Company.
In view of the same, we hereby submit the correct Financial Statements for the said period. Further kindly note that this was merely a printing error and there was no intention to submit false information and we regret the inconvenience caused to the Stock Exchange and the stake holders.
